# extent

**Instance Property**

A rectangle that defines the extent of the effect.

## Declaration

```swift
var extent: CGRect { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **color**: The color of the rounded rectangle.
- **radius**: The distance from the center of the effect.

items.description: The color of the rounded rectangle.
